original_text: Then Abram left the Negev and he went to different places. He arrived at Bethel. He returned to the place where he had put up his tent before. That place was between Bethel and Ai.
korean_text: 그가 네게브에서부터 길을 떠나 벧엘에 이르며 벧엘과 아이 사이 곧 전에 장막 쳤던 곳에 이르니

sentences.original_text: and he went to different places
where he had put up his tent before
That place was between Bethel and Ai
sentences.korean_translation: 그 장소는 베델과 아이 사이에 있었습니다
